Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision: assign a team to a project

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision: include a user story in the sprint backlog

Name: allocate_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision: assign a task to a worker

Name: set_sprint_duration_days
Description: Integer decision: planned sprint length in days

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: Binary decision: link a Scrum Master to a team

Name: prioritize_feature_rank
Description: Integer decision: priority rank for a feature (lower is higher)

Name: select_epic_for_backlog
Description: Binary decision: include an epic in the product backlog

Name: plan_release_includes_feature
Description: Binary decision: include a feature in a release plan

Name: set_task_effort_estimate
Description: Integer decision: effort estimate for a task (points/hours)

Name: assign_product_owner_to_backlog
Description: Binary decision: link a Product Owner to a Product Backlog

Name: choose_sprint_goal
Description: Binary decision: select a sprint goal for the sprint

Name: limit_max_backlog_entries
Description: Integer decision: cap number_of_entries in backlog (planning timebox)
